description: The Moo Fodder is a demonstration farm, focusing on providing diverse planting materials to farmers, NGOs, and cooperative societies across Kenya and beyond. Established in 2016, it aims to enhance food security by offering affordable, high-quality planting materials like Australian Red Napier and various other grasses. The initiative also emphasizes education and training for farmers, promoting sustainable agricultural practices and improving overall food systems in the region.
name: Moo Fodder
